resources.string: I am Roman Pantyukhov, I created the FirstKnowledge app as absolutely free. This SERVICE is offered by Roman Pantyukhov free of charge and for use as is. If you choose to use my application, then you agree to this privacy policy. This application does not collect, use, store any of your Personal Information and does not transfer it to anyone.
When using my application, I will not ask you for any Personal Information. The application does not use third party services that collect information used to identify you.

I want to inform you that when you use the application, in the event of an error in the application, I do not collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone, called log data.
I value your personal information, therefore this application does not collect, process, process or store any of your Personal information and does not transfer it to anyone.
This application does not contain links to other sites.
This app is intended for use by individuals under the age of 13 for educational purposes only. I do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13.

I may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Therefore, you are encouraged to periodically review this page for changes. I will notify you of any changes by posting a new Privacy Policy on this page. This policy is valid from 05.11.2020
If you have any questions or suggestions regarding my Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact me at Pantiukov.R@gmail.com.
